item.description:
Please join us as we meetup to see how we can help South Shore Habitat for Humanity's Easton Local Partnerhip Committee (LPC).  This LPC is being re-established as we have land in which to build a new house but need to mobilize the community to help raise funds.

 

The Easton LPC meets the 4th Thursday of the month in Easton (exact location changes).  We had a full house of 30 people at our June Kick-Off Meeting and are excited to re-establish this LPC and move forward with fundraising and more as we anticipate breaking ground this fall.

 

Please join us as we learn more about Habitat for Humanity and each other.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Habitat for Humanity Easton LPC July Post-Kick-Off Meeting!

Thursday, July 26th @ 6:30pm

VFW Hall

61 Rockland Street

North Easton, MA

W: www.sshabitat.org

E: EastonLPC@sshabitat.org

Please Note:  If you are unable to attend but want to get involved and be added to the email distribution list please email your name, email address, (phone # if you wish,) and town to EastonLPC@sshabitat.org.


Event Host(s)/Organizer(s): Angela

Min/Max: Angela will be attending regardless of whether anyone else attends.  Maximum attendee limit to 25 people.

Guests: Welcome!

Fees/Costs: None, unless we go out for a bite to eat afterwards.  Please bring cash to pay for your food and beverages if so.

RSVP Deadline: Thursday, July 26th @ 2pm ~ Please be so kind as to change your RSVP by this time if you will not be joining us.  There is no need to RSVP "No" after this time.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions:

From the Boston/Braintree area



Keep left to take I-93 S / US-1 S via EXIT 20A toward I-95 / Canton.

Merge onto RT-24 S via EXIT 4 on the left toward Brockton.

Merge onto Belmont St / RT-123 W via EXIT 17B toward Easton.

Turn right onto Washington St / RT-138.

Turn left onto Main St.

Turn slight left onto Lincoln St.

Turn left onto Bay Rd.

Turn right onto Rockland St.

61 ROCKLAND ST is on the right.

From the South

 

Merge onto I-495 N / RT-25 W toward RT-24 / Boston / Marlboro.

Merge onto RT-24 N via EXIT 7A toward Boston.

Merge onto RT-106 W via EXIT 16B toward Mansfield.

Turn right onto RT-123 / Depot St / Bay Rd.

Turn slight left onto Bay Rd.

Turn left onto Rockland St.

61 ROCKLAND ST is on the right

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: South Shore Habitat for Humanity Easton LPC July Post-Kick-Off Meeting!
